subject: fd: Add support for managed file descriptors
commitMessage:
fd: Add support for managed file descriptors

This change adds support for unowned file descriptor references,
uniquely owned file descriptors, and copyable file descriptors. These
are useful because they convey the lifetimes and ownership of a file
descriptor and correctly close the descriptor using RAII.

Change-Id: I55b9df9ee81109bac5ecfb66a8b53bb5db648de8
Signed-off-by: William A. Kennington III <wak@google.com>
